room_title: Escape room "Spirit of Harlem" by Hoodwinked Escape in New York
review: Just want to say how comfortable everyone there made me and my family feel .... from the receptionist whom I called like 4 different times and each time the energy was amazing and so helpful.... to the woman who greeted us she was a gem .... me and my husband was born and raised in Harlem but now live in Long Island which have many escape rooms but because of the wonderful ppl you have we will definitely visit again and again ... thank you for showing us how we rock ✊🏾✊🏾✊🏾👍🏾👍🏾✌🏾✌🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾

room_title: Escape room "Spirit of Harlem" by Hoodwinked Escape in New York
review: Such friendly staff, and we had a great time (even though we didn't escape in time!) everyone from the 9-yr-old to my MIL enjoyed themselves. The Spirit of Harlem room was perfect for us.

room_title: Escape room "Spirit of Harlem" by Hoodwinked Escape in New York
review: I've done quite a few escape rooms by this point so our group was able to get out with 31 minutes to spare. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, and the games have fun back stories. I would love to see something a little more difficult in the future maybe with 3+ rooms but I applaud their creativity of their puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "Spirit of Harlem" by Hoodwinked Escape in New York
review: The staff was wonderful and friendly. And I enjoyed the room as well it was very different from my other escape the room experiences. I'll definitely recommend and go again soon!!
